table.name: vtiger_cbpulse
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbpulse` ( `cbpulseid` int(11) NOT NULL, `cbpulse_no` varchar(100) NOT NULL, `questionid` int(100) NOT NULL, `pactive` char(100), `sendmethod` varchar(100) default 'Email', `schtypeid` varchar(100) default NULL, `schtime` time default NULL, `schdayofmonth` varchar(200) default NULL, `schdayofweek` varchar(200) default NULL, `schannualdates` varchar(200) default NULL, `schminuteinterval` varchar(200) default NULL, `nexttrigger_time` datetime default NULL, `workflowid` int(100) default NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbpulseid`), index (`questionid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbpulsecf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_cbpulsecf` ( `cbpulseid` int(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cbpulseid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
